name: XWUI Flex Component
description: Flexbox layout container component for creating flexible layouts. Supports row and column directions, alignment options, justification, wrapping, and gap spacing. Useful for flexible responsive layouts.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

gap.description: Gap between flex items (string or number)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the flex container

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

items.description: Array of items (strings or HTMLElements) to display in the flex container
